thread.section_title: www.arguscarhire.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.arguscarhire.com | www.arguscarhire.com
thread.title: Naresh Patel

author: Naresh Patel
title: Naresh Patel
text:
The service was great and easy. Had a auto upgrade which was a great bonus
Car was clean and reliable.
Helpful advice in driving in Marrakesh and do's and don't in driving. Very helpful.
Only down side was that I got asked to pay in cash for the tental, when I was told I can pay by Credit card. I was lucky to have extra cash otherwise my holiday would have been cut short due to lack of funds!! They need to make this clear!!!
